Has anyone ever tried using Hex-shaped index cards or similar for the map-making in Dungeon World?<br /><br />I&#39;m talking about something like:<br /><br /><a href="http://www.makeplayingcards.com/design/blank-hex-cards-tiles-deck.html" class="ot-anchor">http://www.makeplayingcards.com/design/blank-hex-cards-tiles-deck.html</a>


Attachment:

<a href='http://www.makeplayingcards.com/design/blank-hex-cards-tiles-deck.html'>Blank Hex Cards Tile for Game Designs</a>

        <p>^Absolutely Hexomorpho. Top stuff.<br /><br />Also, I have ordered square and tarot from MPC before, they are great.<br /><br />Also, I have used hex tiles from a fabric store (they&#39;re for quilting) to make maps for kids games.</p>
